lines.text:
[to one of the bank robbers after defeating the group]
This is the kind of American you're up against and why you don't stand a chance, you asshole.

[to Will]
Looks like we're going on a different sort of hunting trip.
Not only do you have no witnesses, but everyone thinks you saved the President.
Exactly.
It stinks!
The only thing we had in common together is dead!
My brother is nothing like you!

[clocks shotgun]
Your brother is dead.
Things have come full circle, for the Alexander family... Uggh!
I will not kill you - but I will cause you great pain
I want action!
Come on Will. I don't think you're a failure, just a little strange.
What do you mean?
It's the man's birthday and you show up in Khruschev's jacket!
[referring to the Soviet flag on the back of Will's jacket]
The test is over. You were right. He is a warrior, a true fighter... he stays.
[after Will passed with flying colours against his prodige Russo in a test of skill]
Franco! He works for the government! I recognize him.
Is he right... Jessie?
Your man is wrong!
My men are never wrong!
There's always a first time and this is it!
